creator: Tech Geekz Apps
descriptionHtml:
The app contains 25000+ Motivational, Inspirational Thoughts for Happy and Successful life from Great Legends.

Features of the App

# Best Handpicked Motivational , Inspirational and success Thoughts.
# Authors Biography : You can read about Authors.
# All types of thoughts Love, Success, Motivational, Wisdom, Greatness etc
# Great Leaders and Legends : Thoughts from all great leaders like Lincoln, Mahatma Gandhi, Steve Jobs Einsteen, Martin Luthar etc.
# Search by Author : you can search thoughts by author name.
# Thought of The Day: Get “ daily and start your day with enthusiasm.
# Copy and paste the thoughts anywhere.
# Add a thought in favorite for quick access.
# New Thoughts added regularly.

You can share thought with your friends using Facebook or using Messaging and also you can mail.



# keep yourself refreshed by reading these free quotes on the go.
# Get a new thought each day to help you reflect on subjects like love, faith, compassion, motivation and more…
